query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dataEmissao, '%Y-%m') as mes, COUNT(*) as total FROM notas WHERE dataEmissao IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dataEmissao, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY mes DESC LIMIT 15;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HdhHhoU3VLn73V.2659abed3564 --database 2ckaMFDgknxSWbaAs85a3h --execute SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dataEmissao, '%Y-%m') as mes, COUNT(*) as total FROM notas WHERE dataEmissao IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dataEmissao, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY mes DESC LIMIT 15;
